question: Hindola palace’ also called ‘Swinging palace’ is located in which district of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: Hindola Mahal a ‘T’ shaped building is said to be built by Hoshang Shah, around A.D. 1425 as a Durbar hall or meeting hall at mandu. Hindola mahal, Baz Bahadur’s Palace, Hoshang Shah’s Tomb and Jahaz mahal are few famous sites located at Mandu city of Dhar district
